name: tryit v3.3 - adblock fix - w3schools.com
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
for those who have a adblocker running. this style removes the top spacing where the advertisment should be on w3schools.com. this style does not supersede an adblock extension / add on. test page : w3schools.com/jquery/tryit.asp?filename=tryjquery_mouseenter
